application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 22/03672/FUL: detailed drawings and sample materials (4), final SuDS strategy (6) and overheating risk assessment (10) in respect of demolition of all buildings and structures and redevelopment of the site with the erection of three buildings subdivided into seven units for B2 general industrial, B8 storage and distribution, and E(g)(iii) light industrial purposes with ancillary offices, together with associated car parking, servicing and landscape planting.
site_name: Land At Commercial Road And 4 And 8 Bull LaneLondonN18
decision_conditions: The information provided in respect of discharging condition 4 (detailed drawings and sample materials) and condition 6 (final sustainable drainage strategy) are considered insufficient and inadequate, thereby considered unacceptable. The proposal is contrary to Policies D4, S12 and S13 of the London Plan (2021), Policies CP28 and CP30 of the Core Strategy (2010), Policies DMD 37 and DMD 61 of the Enfield Development Management Plan (2014) and the NPPF (2023). As discharge of conditions cannot be part discharged, this also means condition 10 has not been discharged.
